realm.name: Te P≈ç Assistant
realm.description: The living bridge between Kitenga Whiro intelligence and the Awa Network.

model_fields.name: text
model_fields.default: Field(..., description='Raw chat text to save and vectorize')

model_fields.name: role
model_fields.default: Field('user', description='Role that generated this text (user/assistant)')

model_fields.name: thread_id
model_fields.default: Field(None, description='Optional thread id for continuity')

model_fields.name: assistant_reply
model_fields.default: Field(None, description='Assistant reply to accompany the user text')

model_fields.name: focus
model_fields.default: Field(None, description="Specific areas to focus on (e.g., 'performance', 'security')")

model_fields.name: context
model_fields.default: Field(None, description='Code context or error description')

model_fields.name: query
model_fields.default: Field(..., description='User query to recall context for.')

model_fields.name: top_k
model_fields.default: Field(default=None, ge=1, le=50, description='Maximum matches to return.')

model_fields.name: realm_name
model_fields.default: Field(..., description='Name of the realm (e.g., Te Wai)')

model_fields.name: kaitiaki_instructions
model_fields.default: Field(None, description='Custom instructions for the AI assistant')

model_fields.name: description
model_fields.default: Field(None, description='Description of the realm and its purpose')

model_fields.name: selected_apis
model_fields.default: Field(None, description='List of APIs to enable')

model_fields.name: template
model_fields.default: Field('basic', description='Template type: basic, with-kaitiaki, with-storage, full')

model_fields.name: github_org
model_fields.default: Field(None, description='GitHub organization for suggested repo URL')

model_fields.name: file_url
model_fields.default: Field(..., description='Remote URL with the bytes to OCR')

model_fields.name: taonga_mode
model_fields.default: Field(default=False, description='Preserve stealth metadata when true')

model_fields.name: prefer_offline
model_fields.default: Field(default=True, description='Try local OCR before OpenAI vision')

model_fields.name: context
model_fields.default: Field(default=None, description='Optional translation context or guidance')

model_fields.name: thread_id
model_fields.default: Field(default=None, description='Assistant thread id for continuity')

model_fields.name: metadata
model_fields.default: Field(default=None, description='Optional metadata stored in logs')
